inclusion.criterion: Pain intensity measured with a numerical rating scale (NPRS) over the last 14 days >3/10
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Specific LBP diagnosis - radicular pain, disc herniation, spondylolisthesis, stenosis
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Any low limb surgery in the last 3 months; surgery involving the lumbar spine
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, which may be relevant to their eligibility.
